text: The Pickwick Papers is the first novel by Charles Dickens. The Pickwick Papers may also refer to: *The Pickwick Papers (1913 film), a silent film adaptation by Vitagraph Studios *The Pickwick Papers (1952 film), a British black-and- white film adaptation *The Pickwick Papers (1985 film), an Australian animated film adaptation *The Pickwick Papers (TV series), a television adaptation first broadcast in 1985 by the BBC
title: The Pickwick Papers (disambiguation)
